explains: adv. 在上游；从上游；向上游

sentences.en: Heavy goods could be brought upriver in barges.
sentences.cn: 沉重的货物可由驳船朝上游运送。

sentences.en: Steamboats were not only faster but also transported upriver freight for about one-tenth of what it had previously cost on hand-propelled keelboats.
sentences.cn: 蒸汽船不仅速度更快，往上游运送货物的成本也只有以前手推运货船的十分之一。

sentences.en: News has been coming upriver, none of it good.
sentences.cn: 从上游来的消息没有一件是好的。
